content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) *
 FROM [hrtable].[Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 file]

SELECT Department, Sex,count(Sex) over(PARTITION BY Department) as dept_wise  FROM [hrtable].[Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 file]
SELECT Department, Sex,avg(Salary) over(PARTITION BY Department) as avg_salary  FROM [hrtable].[Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 file]

ALTER TABLE [hrtable].[Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 file] ALTER COLUMN Absences int;

SELECT Salary,Department, RecruitmentSource,EngagementSurvey,sum(Absences) over ( PARTITION by Department) as abs_dep,count(Sex) over(PARTITION by Department) as count_depart from [hrtable].[Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 file]

SELECT Department,Salary, Rank() over (PARTITION by Salary order by Department) as rank from [hrtable].[Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 file]
